title: 92x19: Receipt of Outside Payment by Covered Employee from a Practice Involving Fiduciary Relationships
summary: A noncareer member of the Senior Executive Service was deemed to have taken compensation from an outside position that involved a fiduciary relationship in violation of 5 U.S.C. app. § 502 and 5 C.F.R. § 2636.303(b) when he received payments from his medical practice while serving as a public official.
